instruction: Mother has a history of a condition that makes the patient cautious about medication adherence.

attributes.note: Mother has a history of a condition that makes the patient cautious about medication adherence.

instruction: If a dose of medication is missed, take it as soon as remembered unless it's close to the next scheduled dose.
